column1: Funeral services will be: 1 PM on Monday June 22
column2: 2015 at the Avram Funeral Home with Pastor James Bruner officitating. Family will receive visitors: 2-8 PM on Sunday June 21 at the funeral home and 12 PM until time of service Monday.
